text: César Fernando Silvera Fontela (born May 7, 1971 in Montevideo, Uruguay) is a former Uruguayan footballer who played for clubs of Uruguay, Paraguay, Argentina, Chile, Brazil, Spain, Switzerland, Israel and Poland. ==Teams== * Peñarol 1991-1993 * Ferro Carril Oeste 1994-1995 * Villarreal 1996 * Olimpia 1996 * Unión Española 1997 * FC Lugano 1997 * Tacuary 1998-1999 * Maccabi Herzliya 2000-2003 * Brasil de Pelotas 2003-2004 * Pogoń Szczecin 2005 * Brasil de Pelotas 2006-2007 ==References== * Profile at BDFA * * Profile at Tenfield Digital * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:Uruguay international footballers Category:Peñarol players Category:FC Lugano players Category:Villarreal CF players Category:Pogoń Szczecin players Category:Club Olimpia footballers Category:Club Tacuary footballers Category:Unión Española footballers Category:Ferro Carril Oeste footballers Category:Maccabi Herzliya F.C. players Category:Grêmio Esportivo Brasil players Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Expatriate footballers in Argentina Category:Expatriate footballers in Paraguay Category:Expatriate footballers in Brazil Category:Expatriate footballers in Spain Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Chile Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Argentina Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Paraguay Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Brazil Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Spain Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Uruguayan expatriate sportspeople in Israel Category:Association football midfielders
title: César Fernando Silvera Fontela
